  time or the patience for classroom learning? Rosetta Stone software provides
  the solution in an easy to use, at your own pace format. Languages included 
  in this release are:
                                                                          
                                                                          
  DVD1:                                                              
  Chinese (Mandarin)                          
  Greek                                        
  Indonesian                          
  Italian                                     
  Japanese                    
  Korean                              
  Latin                                      
  Spanish (Spain)                             
  Thai                                          
  Vietnamese
